name: [Demo] Kanaetai Mission
description:
An adventure game with cool cyber setting.

 Thank you for downloading this game.

 Kanaetai Mission is a fan game created by Team N1R0. 

● Summary

 Title   |  Kanaetai Mission

 Genre   |  Adventure Game

 Author  |  Team N1R0

 Tool    |  RPG Maker MV

 No software is necessary to start the game, but you must extract the ZIP file to a folder.

● Controls

 Move - Arrow keys

 Run - Hold shift + Arrow keys

 Cancel/Menu - Esc

 Select/Interact - Space/Enter

 Skip - Hold Space/Enter    

● Disclaimer

 Recognize that the author takes no responsibility for the trouble and damages brought about by the use of this software.

 It is not affiliated with Nijisanji or ANYCOLOR Inc. All copyright belongs to their respective owners.

 Also, the copyright for used resources belongs to the respective creators and sites. 

 Acknowledge the above before playing the game.
